text: is a town located in Asakuchi District, Okayama Prefecture, Japan. the town has an estimated population of 11,204 and a density of 920 persons per km². The total area is 12.23 km². In 2005, it declined to amalgamate with the neighboring towns of Kamogata and Yorishima to form the city of Asakuchi. Industries include food processing factories (Amano Foods), electronics (Sharp), medicines (Fusso) etc. == Geography == === Neighbouring municipalities === * Asakuchi * Kasaoka == Transportation == === Raliway === * JR West ** San'yo Main Line: Satoshō ==Notable people from Satoshō== *Yoshio Nishina, former physicist *Gōtarō Ogawa, former economist, educator, politician and cabinet minister ==References== ==External links== * *Satoshō official website Category:Towns in Okayama Prefecture
title: Satoshō
